review_feedback: I'll be updating Whirligig on the Oculus Store soon. Although you can try out the betas on the Steam version if you like. I'll be happy to provide a code if you like, just email me phileday@yahoo.co.uk

review_title: Vr videos of any kind and resolution
one_reviews_text:
Great video player, a lot of options, it manage to play any kind of video with a very high depth of settings and enhancement. Good job indeed.
(8k videos supported)

I cant play any videos with this.. Yet I have all codecs installed.. Use MPC and MadVR etc, all those work fine.  Some mp4 play, but anything else cannot due to being inside a MKV container.  This program is either unable to access codecs or is missing its own.. unsure..
review_feedback:
Hi, don't know if you're get this reply but if you like I would like to offer some help and also access to the Oculus beta of the latest build. 

If you're interested let me know phileday@yahoo.co.uk 

All the best

Phil

one_reviews_text: Finally, Whirligig becomes the best VR player again with  recent update with better mediainfo support. So why it's not 5 stars? Because it's only available at steam for now.

Whirligig now has a hue slider! 
This video player is as near-perfect as they come.
The developer is a true believer in what he is doing, intends to evolve Whirligig beyond what it is today.
What it is today is definately worth what little money he asks for it. 
You won't regret buying it.
